Generation VIII.Sword: The ice covering this Pokémon's face has shattered, revealing a slightly worried expression that many people are enamored with.
Generation VIII.Shield: The hair on its head connects to the surface of its brain. When this Pokémon has something on its mind, its hair chills the air around it.

Generation IX.Scarlet: The ice that was covering this Eiscue’s face has shattered. Eiscue emits cold air from the tip of its hair to protect its head, which is sensitive to heat.
Generation IX.Violet: Contrary to its looks, Eiscue is a poor swimmer. It creates ice balls at the tip of its single hair to lure prey in and fish them up.

Generation VIII.Sword: Use Dynamax Crystal ★And603 at Watchtower Lair ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 10 , Lake of Outrage Dusty Bowl , Giant's Cap , Giant's Seat , Hammerlocke Hills , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield Expansion Pass: Frigid Sea Giant's Bed , Frigid Sea ( Max Raid Battle )

Generation IX.Scarlet: Union Circle Tera Raid Battle Search ( 4★ )
Generation IX.Violet: North Province: Area Three , North Paldean Sea Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ )
